name: Payday Loans Online
short_description:
The Payday Loans Online chrome app streamlines access to PaydayR's network of 100+ direct lenders, providing quick and easy access to instant online financing, straight from the browser.

The app features access to 100+ lenders, 24/7 availability, secure applications, instant approval and no paperwork or waiting.

More than 100 licensed direct lenders
Available around the clock, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
128-bit SSL encrypted transmissions
Approval within seconds
100% online application process

PaydayR is committed to developing new and innovative solutions that make the process of getting short-term online loans as easy as possible. By meeting the growing demand for smarter online payday loan services, as well as other short-term lending solutions, PaydayR is helping consumers to manage debt effectively and realize goals of financial independence. 

Learn more about payday loans online from our website at http://paydayr.com
summary: A simple Chrome app for connecting to PaydayR's financing network.
